errors.description:
Error list returned by the Criteo API
For successful requests it is empty

warnings.description:
Warnings list returned by the Criteo API
In some situations the operations are successful but it may be useful to issue warnings to the API consumer.
For example the endpoint, entity or field is deprecated. Warnings are like compiler warnings, they indicate that problems may occur in the future.

id.description: A unique identifier for the item. Aka Product ID.

title.description: Title of the item. (500 UTF8 characters max).

description.description: Description of the item. RECOMMENDED. (5000 UTF8 characters max).

link.description: URL directly linking to your item's page on your website. (1000 UTF8 characters max).

imageLink.description: URL of an image of the item. Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, GIF. (2000 UTF8 characters max).

additionalImageLinks.description: Additional URLs of images of the item.

contentLanguage.description: The two-letter ISO 639-1 language code for the item.

targetCountry.description: The CLDR territory code for the item.

expirationDate.description: Date on which the item should expire, as specified upon insertion, in ISO 8601 format.

adult.description: Set to true if the item is targeted towards adults. RECOMMENDED.

kind.description: Identifies what kind of resource this is.

googleProductCategory.description: Google's category of the item (see Google product taxonomy). RECOMMENDED.

gtin.description: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN) of the item. RECOMMENDED.

itemGroupId.description: Shared identifier for all variants of the same product. RECOMMENDED.

material.description: The material of which the item is made.

mpn.description: Manufacturer Part Number (MPN) of the item. RECOMMENDED.

salePriceEffectiveDate.description: Date range during which the item is on sale.

sizes.description: Size of the item. RECOMMENDED. Only one value is allowed. For variants with different sizes, insert a separate product for each size with the same itemGroupId value.

customAttributes.description: A list of custom (merchant-provided) attributes. This is useful for submitting attributes not explicitly exposed by the API. Declaring attributes explicitly exposed by the API using is forbidden

identifierExists.description: False when the item does not have unique product identifiers appropriate to its category, such as GTIN, MPN, and brand. Required according to the Unique Product Identifier Rules for all target countries except for Canada.

multipack.description: The number of identical products in a merchant-defined multipack. To avoid any overflow issue, pass it as a string.

customLabel0.description: Custom label 0 for custom grouping of items in a Shopping campaign.

customLabel1.description: Custom label 1 for custom grouping of items in a Shopping campaign.

customLabel2.description: Custom label 2 for custom grouping of items in a Shopping campaign.

customLabel3.description: Custom label 3 for custom grouping of items in a Shopping campaign.

customLabel4.description: Custom label 4 for custom grouping of items in a Shopping campaign.

isBundle.description: Whether the item is a merchant-defined bundle. A bundle is a custom grouping of different products sold by a merchant for a single price.

mobileLink.description: accounts.link to a mobile-optimized version of the landing page.

availabilityDate.description: The day a pre-ordered product becomes available for delivery, in ISO 8601 format.

shippingLabel.description: The shipping label of the product, used to group product in account-level shipping rules.

displayAdsId.description: An identifier for an item for dynamic remarketing campaigns.

displayAdsTitle.description: Title of an item for dynamic remarketing campaigns.

displayAdsLink.description: URL directly to your item's landing page for dynamic remarketing campaigns.

displayAdsValue.description: Offer margin for dynamic remarketing campaigns.

sellOnGoogleQuantity.description: The quantity of the product that is available for selling on Google. Supported only for online products.

promotionIds.description: The unique ID of a promotion.

maxHandlingTime.description: Maximal product handling time (in business days).

minHandlingTime.description: Minimal product handling time (in business days).

source.description: The source of the offer, i.e., how the offer was created.

includedDestinations.description: The list of destinations to include for this target (corresponds to checked check boxes in Merchant Center). Default destinations are always included unless provided in excludedDestinations.

excludedDestinations.description: The list of destinations to exclude for this target (corresponds to unchecked check boxes in Merchant Center).

adsGrouping.description: Used to group items in an arbitrary way. Only for CPA%, discouraged otherwise.

adsLabels.description: Similar to adsGrouping, but only works on CPC.

adsRedirect.description: Allows advertisers to override the item URL when the product is shown within the context of Product Ads.

productTypes.description: Categories of the item (formatted as in products data specification).

ageGroup.description: Target age group of the item.

availability.description: Availability status of the item. RECOMMENDED.

condition.description: Condition or state of the item.

sizeSystem.description: System in which the size is specified. Recommended for apparel items.

sizeType.description: The cut of the item. Recommended for apparel items.

energyEfficiencyClass.description: The energy efficiency class as defined in EU directive 2010/30/EU.

minEnergyEfficiencyClass.description: The energy efficiency class as defined in EU directive 2010/30/EU.

maxEnergyEfficiencyClass.description: The energy efficiency class as defined in EU directive 2010/30/EU.

taxCategory.description: The tax category of the product, used to configure detailed tax nexus in account-level tax settings.

transitTimeLabel.description: The transit time label of the product, used to group product in account-level transit time tables.

sellerId.description: The ID of the seller (case sensitive and 50 UTF8 characters max). This information is required by the Criteo Resellers Program.

Product.description: Defines a product to be inserted or updated.

currency.description: The price represented as a number.

value.description: The weight of the product used to calculate the shipping cost of the item.

ProductShippingWeight.description: Defines the shipping weight of a product.

months.description: The number of installments the buyer has to pay.

Installment.description: Defines the installment of a product.

name.description: Name of loyalty points program. It is recommended to limit the name to 12 full-width characters or 24 Roman characters.

pointsValue.description: The retailer's loyalty points in absolute value.

ratio.description: The ratio of a point when converted to currency. Google assumes currency based on Merchant Center settings. If ratio is left out, it defaults to 1.0.

LoyaltyPoints.description: Defines how a client earns loyalty points after buying this product.

value.description: The denominator of the unit price.
The dimension of the product used to calculate the shipping cost of the item.

ProductShippingDimension.description: Defines the shipping dimension of a product.

country.description: The CLDR territory code of the country to which an item will ship.

region.description: The geographic region to which a shipping rate applies.

service.description: A free-form description of the service class or delivery speed.

locationId.description: The numeric ID of a location that the shipping rate applies to as defined in the AdWords API.

locationGroupName.description: The location where the shipping is applicable, represented by a location group name.

postalCode.description: The postal code range that the shipping rate applies to, represented by a postal code, a postal code prefix followed by a * wildcard, a range between two postal codes or two postal code prefixes of equal length.

ProductShipping.description: Defines the shipping information of a product.

rate.description: The percentage of tax rate that applies to the item price.

country.description: The country within which the item is taxed, specified as a CLDR territory code.

region.description: The geographic region to which the tax rate applies.

taxShip.description: Set to true if tax is charged on shipping.

locationId.description: The numeric ID of a location that the tax rate applies to as defined in the AdWords API.

postalCode.description: The postal code range that the tax rate applies to, represented by a ZIP code, a ZIP code prefix using * wildcard, a range between two ZIP codes or two ZIP code prefixes of equal length. Examples: 94114, 94*, 94002-95460, 94*-95*.

ProductTax.description: Defines the tax information of a product.
